Wisdom Source.quote: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom, and knowledge of the Holy One is understanding. (Proverbs 9:10)

Eternal Wisdom.quote: Before the mountains were settled in place, before the hills, I was given birth. (Proverbs 8:25)

Universal Wisdom.quote: Wisdom has built her house; she has set up its seven pillars. (Proverbs 9:1)

Wisdom Nature.quote: But the wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, open to reason, full of mercy and good fruits. (James 3:17)

Divine Understanding.quote: He gives wisdom to whom He wills, and whoever has been given wisdom has certainly been given much good. (Quran 2:269)

Wisdom Path.quote: By wisdom a house is built, and through understanding it is established. (Proverbs 24:3)

Sacred Knowledge.quote: Knowledge is a divine light which Allah casts into the heart of whomever He wishes. (Al-Ghazali)

Wisdom Teaching.quote: When the student is ready, the teacher will appear. (Buddhist Proverb)

Inner Wisdom.quote: The kingdom of God is within you. (Luke 17:21)

Wisdom Practice.quote: Wisdom ceases to be wisdom when it becomes too proud to weep, too grave to laugh. (Kahlil Gibran)

Divine Intelligence.quote: The intellect is the finest and most precious gift of creation. (Imam Ali)

Cosmic Wisdom.quote: As above, so below; as below, so above. (Hermes Trismegistus)

Wisdom Manifestation.quote: Wisdom is radiant and unfading. (Wisdom of Solomon 6:12)

Living Wisdom.quote: Let the wise hear and increase in learning, and the one who understands obtain guidance. (Proverbs 1:5)

Wisdom Light.quote: In your light we see light. (Psalm 36:9)

Sacred Understanding.quote: Understanding is the reward of faith. Therefore, seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand. (Augustine of Hippo)

Wisdom Integration.quote: Where there is righteousness in the heart, there is beauty in the character. (Buddhist Teaching)

Divine Knowledge.quote: Knowledge without practice is like a tree without fruit. (Al-Ghazali)

Wisdom Transmission.quote: Acquire knowledge and impart it to the people. (Prophet Muhammad)

Eternal Truth.quote: Truth is one, paths are many. (Mahatma Gandhi)

Wisdom Application.quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens. (Jimi Hendrix)

Sacred Science.quote: The book of nature is written in the language of mathematics. (Galileo Galilei)

Divine Guidance.quote: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path. (Psalm 119:105)

Wisdom Mystery.quote: The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know. (Socrates)

Universal Knowledge.quote: All wisdom comes from the Divine. (Wisdom of Sirach 1:1)

Wisdom Service.quote: The fruit of wisdom is service to humanity. (Sathya Sai Baba)

Divine Philosophy.quote: Philosophy is the love of wisdom. (Pythagoras)

Wisdom Evolution.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself. (Rumi)

Sacred Wisdom.quote: The wise person has the wisdom of life. (Lao Tzu)

Divine Understanding.quote: Understanding is a wellspring of life unto him that hath it. (Proverbs 16:22)
